name: YoukeyLife

”Alexa, show the front door”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Youkey Life skill, you can easily integrate your smart home cameras with Amazon Alexa devices and enjoy the convenience of voice control. 

Key Features:
Real-time Viewing: Instantly view live footage from different cameras in your home using Alexa voice commands.
Flexible Control: Pause or resume camera streams at any time to suit your lifestyle.

How to Use:
Set Up Cameras: Ensure your Youkey cameras are properly configured and working through the Youkey Life app.
Enable the Skill: Search for the "Youkey Life" skill in the Alexa app and link your Youkey Life account with your Alexa account.
Voice Control: Use the names you assigned to your cameras during setup and control them with commands like:
“Alexa, show me the garage camera.”
“Alexa, stop the camera.”

Compatible Devices:
This skill works with all Alexa-enabled devices, such as Amazon Echo, Echo Show, Echo Spot, and more.
Start enjoying the convenience of a smart home with the Youkey Life skill, and easily manage your home security with voice control.
